SA15n1259:3: nanu cāṇū nāmayaḥśalākākalpatvenānyonyaṃ sambandhābhāvataḥ sthūlādipratīterbhrāntatvāt kathaṃ tadvaśāt tatsvabhāvo bhāvaḥ syāt ?
SA15n1259:4: tathā hi- sambandho'rthānāṃ pāratantryalakṣaṇo vā syāt,
SA15n1259:12: pāratantryaṃ hi sambandhaḥ siddhe kā paratantratā |
SA15n1259:13: tasmāt sarvasya bhāvasya sambandho nāsti tattvataḥ ||1 ||
SA15n1259:21: nirantaratāyāśca sambandharūpatve sāntaratāpi kathaṃ sambandho na syāt ?
SA15n1259:24: sarvātmanā rūpaśleṣe aṇūnāṃ piṇḍaḥ aṇumātraḥ syāt |
SA15n1259:30: tairapyaṇūnāṃ sarvātmanaikadeśena vā rūpaśleṣe sa eva paryanuyogaḥ,
SA15n1259:32: rūpaśleṣo hi sambadho dvitve sa ca kathaṃ bhavet |
SA15n1259:36: taṃ cāpekṣate bhāvaḥ svayaṃ san, asan vā ?
SA15n1259:41: tanna parāpekṣā nāma yadrūpaḥ sambandhaḥ siddhyet |
SA15n1259:45: kiñca-asau sambandhaḥ sambandhibhyāṃ bhinnaḥ, abhinno vā?
SA15n1259:53: tathāpi tenaikena sambandhena saha dvayoḥ sambandhinoḥ kaḥ sambandhaḥ ?
SA15n1259:63: tau ca bhāvau tadanyaśca sarve te svātmani sthitāḥ |
SA15n1259:65: tau ca bhāvau sambandhinau tābhyāmanyaśca sambandhaḥ,
SA15n1259:70: tasya pratyāyanāya kriyākārakādivācinaḥ śabdāḥ prayojyante-‘devadatta gāmabhyāja śuklāṃ daṇḍena’ ityādayaḥ |
SA15n1259:79: na khalu kāraṇakāle kāryaṃ tatkāle vā kāraṇamasti,
SA15n1259:82: tanna sambandhinau sahabhāvinau vidyete yeṃnānayorvartamāno'sau sambandhaḥ syāt |
SA15n1259:86: kārye kāraṇe vā krameṇāsau sambandho vartate-ityapyasāmpratam;
SA15n1259:87: yataḥ krameṇāpi bhāvaḥ sambandhākhya ekatra kāraṇe kārye vā varttamāno'nyanispṛhaḥ=kāryakāraṇayoranyatarānapekṣo naikavṛttimān sambandho yuktaḥ;
SA15n1259:91: yadi punaḥ kāryakāraṇayorekaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ vāpekṣyānyatra kārye kāraṇe vāsau sambandhaḥ krameṇa varttata iti saspṛhatvena dviṣṭha eveṣyate;
SA15n1259:95: yadā kāraṇakāle kāryākhyo bhāvo'san tatkāle vā kāraṇākhyastadā naivopakuryād;
SA15n1259:101: dviṣṭho hi kaścit sambandho nāto'nyattasya lakṣaṇam |
SA15n1259:103: na yena kenacidekena sambandhāt seṣyate; kiṃ tarhi ?
SA15n1259:111: tāvupādhī viśeṣaṇaṃ yasya yogasya=sambandhasya sa kāryakāraṇatā yadi na sarvasambandhaḥ;
SA15n1259:114: bhedāccet ‘bhāve hi bhāvo'bhāve cābhāvaḥ‘ iti bahavo'bhidheyāḥ kathaṃ kāryakāraṇatetyekārthābhidhāyinā śabdenocyante ?
SA15n1259:116: niyoktā hi yaṃ śabdaṃ yathā prayuṅkte tathā prāha,
SA15n1259:117: ityanekatrāpyekā śrutirna virudhyate iti tāveva kāryakāraṇatā ||12 ||
SA15n1259:120: yasmāt paśyannekaṃ kāraṇābhimatamupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyā'dṛṣṭasya kāryākhyasya darśane sati tadadarśane ca satyapaśyatkāryamanveti ‘idamato bhavati’ iti pratipadyate janaḥ ‘ata idaṃ jātam’ ityākhyātṛbhirvināpi ||13 ||
SA15n1259:123: tasmād darśanādarśane viṣayiṇi viṣayopacārāt-bhāvābhāvau muktvā kāryabuddherasambhavāt kāryādiśrutirapyatra ‘bhāvābhāvayormā lokaḥ pratipadamiyatīṃ śabdamālāmabhidadhyāt’ iti vyavahāralāghavārthaṃ niveśiteti ||14 ||
SA15n1259:126: anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ kāryakāraṇatā nānyā cet kathaṃ bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ sā prasādhyate?
SA15n1259:127: tadabhāvābhāvāt liṅgāt tatkāryatāgatiryāpyanuvarṇyate-‘asyedaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca’ iti;
SA15n1259:129: yathā ‘gaurayaṃ sāsnādimattvāt’ ityanena govyavahārasya viṣayaḥ pradarśyate ||15 ||
SA15n1259:130: bhāve bhāvini tadbhāvo bhāva eva ca bhāvitā |
SA15n1259:132: yataśca ‘bhāve bhāvini=bhavanadharmiṇi tadbhāvaḥ=kāraṇābhimatasya bhāva eva kāraṇatvam,
SA15n1259:133: bhāve eva kāraṇābhimatasya bhāvitā kāryābhimatasya kāryatvam’ iti prasiddhe pratyakṣānupalambhato hetuphalate |
SA15n1259:138: so'rtho yeṣāṃ vikalpānāṃ te etāvanmātratattvārthāḥ=etāvanmātrabījāḥ kāryakāraṇagocarāḥ,
SA15n1259:142: bhāvehyanyasya viśliṣṭau śliṣṭau syātāṃ kathaṃ ca tau ||18 ||
SA15n1259:151: ityatrāpi bhāve sattāyāmanyasya sambandhasya viśliṣṭau kāryakāraṇābhimatau śliṣṭau syātām,
SA15n1259:156: sarvametenāntantaroktena sāmānyasambandhapratiṣedhena cintitam saṃyogyādīnāmanyonyamanupakārāccājanyajanakabhāvācca na sambandhī ca tādṛśo'nupakāryopakārakabhūtaḥ ||19 ||
SA15n1259:159: athāsti kaścit samavāyī yo'vayavirūpaṃ kāryaṃ janayati,
SA15n1259:162: yato janane'pi kāryasya kenacit samavāyinābhyupagamyamāne samavāyī,
SA15n1259:164: na ca tato jananāt samavāyitvaṃ siddhyati;
SA15n1259:167: sambandho yadi viśvaṃ syāt samavāyi parasparam ||21 ||
SA15n1259:168: tayoḥ samavāyinoḥ parasparamanupakāre'pi tābhyāṃ vā samavāyasya nityatayā samavāyena vā tayoḥ paratra vā kvacidanupakāre'pi sambandho yadīṣyate;
SA15n1259:169: tadā viśvaṃ parasparāsambaddhaṃ samavāyi parasparaṃ syāt ||21 ||
SA15n1259:174: yadi ca saṃyogasya kāryatvāttasya tābhyāṃ jananāt saṃyogitā tayoḥ tadā saṃyogajanane'piṣṭau,
